message: %s, take off a piece of clothing, or down your drink
%s, take off a piece of clothing, or down your drink
Everyone remove 1 item of clothing of their choice. If anyone refuses, they must drink for 5 seconds.
Everyone remove 1 item of clothing. %s chooses which item. If anyone refuses, everyone must drink.
%s and %s must kiss each other. If either refuses, they both drink.
%s, take body shot off another player in the room. You choose the player
Anyone not wearing one or both of their socks must drink.
